# Verbosity Negative Cases (Should Pass)

Each line is concise and should NOT trigger a warning.

1. To improve, practice regularly.
2. Time is limited, so prioritize.
3. The system performs fast.
4. Read the docs to understand.
5. Bugs exist, so test thoroughly.
6. Push to main to deploy.
7. Microservices work well for this architecture.
8. Scaling requires resources.
9. Monitor production systems.
10. Logs help with debugging.
11. Mock dependencies for testing.
12. We need approval to ship now.
13. Encrypt data for security.
14. We review code regularly for quality.
15. Handle errors when they occur.
16. Simple designs win.
17. Document decisions to collaborate.
18. Complexity grows, so automate testing.
19. Practice is key to learning.
20. Redundancy ensures reliability.
